title: Textile, 1815–25
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by mule roller on plain weave. Engraved roller for brown. Orange printed by a relief surface; either hand-held block or relief roller.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 52 x 48.5 cm (20 1/2 x 19 1/8 in.)
H x W (Minimum pattern unit): 10 x 7.5 cm (3 15/16 x 2 15/16 in.)
description: Alternate stripes of chrome orange (solid) and brown floral sprays with saw-toothed leaf.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1815–25.
1815–25. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by mule roller on plain weave. Engraved roller for brown. Orange printed by a relief surface; either hand-held block or relief roller.. Gift of Dikran Kelekian. 1899-13-36.
